title: T206 Jimmy Collins EPDG SGC 10 SOLD

posts.post_title: T206 Jimmy Collins EPDG SGC 10 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello all, SOLDD, SOLDD
I bought this and it is a little to messed up on the back for me.  Anyone give $40 delivered, just so I can get rid of it, and start raising cash for a termit bill.
Any form of payment is fine.  (SOLD TO Bill.  Thanks email sent)
Thanks,
Bob
